Damon Thomas

About Me

Hello. My name is Damon Thomas. I am a self taught web developer. Before Web Development, I ran a franchise location as the store manager and associate of an M&M Food Market. Before that, I was a 2nd Lieutenant in the military after attending the Royal Military College where I received my Bachelor of Arts in English.

My work

Kanban Board

A Kanban board for tracking tasks by status and sorting them into different projects.

Battleship

A classic game of battleship against a simple computer opponent.

Library

A library for storing and sorting your books. Mark books read or not read, favorite books, or add them to your list of next books to read.

Weather App

A simple weather app that gives you an overview of the weather in the area of your choice.

Restaurant Page

A basic restaurant landing page with a menu, about section, and contact details.

Etch-A-Sketch

A versatile Etch-A-Sketch with plenty of settings to play around with and endless possible creations.
